com.netflix.genie.server.jobmanager

Interface JobMonitor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobMonitorImpl

    public interface JobMonitor
extends java.lang.Runnable
    Interface for the runnable which monitors a job.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setJob(com.netflix.genie.common.model.Job job)
      Set the job for this to monitor.
      void setJobManager(JobManager jobManager)
      Set the job manager for this monitor to use.
      void setProcess(java.lang.Process proc)
      Set the process handle for this job.
      void setThreadSleepTime(int sleepTime)
      Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait in between checks to the process for completion.
      void setWorkingDir(java.lang.String workingDir)
      Set the working directory for this job.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

      • setThreadSleepTime

        void setThreadSleepTime(int sleepTime)
                 throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException
        Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait in between checks to the process for completion.
        Parameters:
        sleepTime - The time to wait in milliseconds
        Throws:
        com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException - if precondition of sleepTime greater than or equal to 1 isn't met.
